thread.title: #VALUE!

author: #VALUE!
title: #VALUE!
text: Believe it or not I thought the first order didn't go through. So I did it again and place a second order, only to find out that both orders went through LOL. My bank account took a big hit. I called the office and talk to a very nice lady ( cant remember her name) who fixed it in 5 minuets to my surprise it was that easy, the money was back in my bank account. WoW that was so easy. and the thought of not getting my money back quick was a nightmare it was done in 24 hours. Thank You so much for understanding and being so kind you were so happy to help me get it taken care of. JOE
